name: Mydhia Online
storyline:
In a distant universe, the loyal servant of the goddess Aura has surrendered to corruption and now seeks to take her place. To carry out his nefarious plans, he built a colossal tower on the most developed planet in the galaxy. There, he promises to grant the deepest desires of those who reach the summit.

Unfortunately, the Wanderers who accepted the challenge were cursed and transformed into terrible monsters by the evil servant. Unless you stop him, a horde of cursed creatures will form to defeat the benevolent goddess Aura. Get ready to fight in this epic journey and prevent darkness from spreading throughout the universe!
summary:
Welcome to the world of Mydhia Online, an MMORPG that brings back the nostalgia of the golden era of RPGs, inspired by classics like Final Fantasy and Chrono Trigger. With 16-bit pixelated graphics, the game captures the same retro vibe as hits like Stardew Valley.

Get ready for real-time combat against hundreds of enemies in a complex and engaging storyline. But remember, Mydhia Online isn't just about solo adventures. Socialization is the key to success in this game, with party, guild, and EXP-sharing systems among friends.

So, join us, Wanderer, and dive yourself into the vast universe of Mydhia.
